start_sources()
# -- monodevelop_plugin.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Editor"
		"Editor/MonoDevelop_Plugin.cpp"
		"Editor/MonoDevelop_Plugin.h"
		"Editor/MonoDevelop_Manager.h"
		"Editor/MonoDevelop_Manager.cpp"

		"DLLMain.cpp"
		"StdAfx.cpp"

)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEditorPlugin(MonoDevelopPlugin PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "Sandbox/Plugins")
use_xt()
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE .. "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CryAction")
